sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import LandingPageImage from "../assets/landing-page.png"; import biker from "../assets/biker.svg"; import phone from "../assets/location.svg"; import building from "../assets/building.svg"; import rightArrow from "../assets/right-arrow.svg"; import friendsEating from "../assets/friends-eating.jpg"; import happyDelivery from "../assets/happy-delivery.jpg"; import envelope from "../assets/envelope.png"; import shoeBox from "../assets/shoe-box.png"; import shoppingBag from "../assets/shopping-bag.png"; import box from "../assets/box.png"; import deliveryBag from "../assets/delivery-bag.png"; import weight from "../assets/weight.svg"; import dimensions from "../assets/package.svg"; import arrow1 from "../assets/arrow-1.png"; import arrow2 from "../assets/arrow-2.png"; import arrow3 from "../assets/arrow-3.png"; import arrow4 from "../assets/arrow-4.png"; import NavBar from "./Layout/NavBar"; import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; const Home = () => { return(

HI, LET'S MAKE A

FAST FOOD
CLOTHING
GADGETS
FILES
MEDICINE
COSMETICS
FOOT WEAR
JEWELRY

DELIVERY


{/*

Li li la this is just dummy text as this is stil indeve lopmentso just be now it is stillbeingprogramnn edsoitisr ubOnihjvgc

*/}

The leading online delivery and logistics services company in Africa. Time is money, at CityRunner, always save both.





Become a Runner

Earn a competitive salary working for the leading delivery company in Africa.

Start running

Try the App

Get the unbeatable CityRunner experience with live order tracking (coming soon).

Get the app

Become a Partner

Grow your business and reach new heights by partnering with us.

Sign up your company


























Happiness in every box

From your favourite outfits, food and gadgets to the game consoles you love, choose from over 100,000 items to be delivered in Lagos.







You know you want it.

We can get it.

Get it delivered right to your door. Order food from your favourite restaurants and always eat it while it's hot.







Time is money. We save you both.



Is it the right size? Ship it fast with CityRunner!

Max size allowed

0.5m x 0.5m x 0.5m

Max weight

25kg
) } export default Home;
